resources.string:
Android 7.0 added new permission called RUN_IN_BACKGROUND, which can block background behavior of apps. However this permission is fully hidden and there's no way to activate it besides using adb commands. 

This app is for those, who don't want to mess with adb shell and input commands manually and prefer to just click on app name to enable/disable it from running in the background. As android apps are not allowed to mess with other apps' permissions, this app requires root to overcome this issue. 

For more detailed information check app's github repo.
